page.title: 16RECENT CHANGES
page.content: The farms have not always been at the top of Highfield Road because a farmer who worked the fields before let them get messed up so he had to close down and the farm house was pulled down. This now a ridding school. Other farms have been built recently. The hairdressers on the main road used to be a grocers shop. She also said that the Health Club used to be a cinema. But then it became a "Potato Peeling Factory". Lots fo women worked there peeling potatoes for the local fish and chip shops. It then became a timber stroage building before opening as a Health Club in l984.
